extendedInfo.description: Navy Clock gives you and your other Android applications the exact atomic time.  It shows you the difference between atomic time and your phone's local time. It's also a reliable time source for all your Android applications! This version of Navy Clock replaces version 1.0, so please un-install version 1.0 first.

reviews.comment: This is one of those so-simple-it\'s-invaluable apps. Exactly what I was looking for. Used it as a reference for the time in my computer\'s bios.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes every time after ~10 sec
reviews.comment: Desire HD on CM7, IceColdSandwich and Transformer Prime on ICS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says.
reviews.comment: Does what it  say, however as it up dates the time from min to min it crashes...Moto Bionic
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes within seconds of being on....I operate trains and use to set my watch, pretty hard to do with this app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Whats the use if my phone has the wrong time and i cant sync it to this?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: I love this app but its been force closing on my Samsung galaxy S II epic touch :/ plz fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: EXCELLENT app! Thank you. Now, I can set my watch to WWV time without tuning in via SW, or finding a desktop \'puter.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crashes.  Unreliable.
reviews.comment: Crashes consistently on my Samsung Galaxy Captivate.  Always crashes when turning to landscape, frequently in portrait.  If I could get it to run for a couple of minutes, there didn\'t seem to be a way to keep the screensaver from kicking in.  Great concept, poor implementation.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good for what it does.I\'m uninstalling because I need it to set my system clock, so switching to ClockSync (for rooted phones).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says. Simple, good app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needless crashes
reviews.comment: I fail to see how something this simple crashes so often. It\'s accurate, but takes a few crashes before it stabilizes. Nexus 4
reviews.author: Matt Littlejohn

reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if it could set my phone time, on interval even better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Time matches internet relayed atomic time exactly. Droid X time exactly 15 seconds faster. Can\'t change seconds on the phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great on Evo Shift
reviews.comment: Great clock app with seconds. I needed something with seconds that wasn\'t a widget. This works perfectly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Shows wrong phone time, der!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent concept
reviews.comment: force closes on my Galaxy Note but I can see the atomic time quickly enough to set my watch
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Crashes upon exit everytime on galaxy s3
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice tool, when works
reviews.comment: Worked great on my old G1, but crashes constantly on my SK4G (a samsung galaxy based phone). Seem to be having issues on galaxy platform.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Useful for setting external clocks accurately
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work on Bionic
reviews.comment: I can\'t speak for other phones, but it doesn\'t sync times on the Moto Bionic. It does at least sync to the server and tells how far off my phone is.
reviews.author: A Google User
